translations: n.[食品]葡萄酒；令人沉醉的东西（wine 的复数）
v.以葡萄酒招待；喝葡萄酒（wine 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: I swigged down two white wines.
sentences.translation: 我大口喝完两杯白葡萄酒。

sentences.sentence: Some superlative wines are made in this region.
sentences.translation: 一些极好的葡萄酒产自这个地区。

sentences.sentence: Italian wines are on (special) offer this week.
sentences.translation: 意大利葡萄酒本周特价销售。
